author: FourFourTwo
description: Leaving PSG to return to Chelsea was a "risk" for David Luiz, who says he took a pay cut to come back to Stamford Bridge.
title: David Luiz took pay cut to return to Chelsea

author: BBC Sport
description: David Luiz says taking a pay cut to return to Chelsea has been a success with a league title and the chance of the Double.
title: FA Cup final: David Luiz says taking pay cut to rejoin Chelsea was worth it

author: FourFourTwo
description: Chelsea centre-back David Luiz has admitted using current Blues team-mate Cesc Fabregas on the PlayStation when he was a teenager.
title: David Luiz: Even though weâ€™re same age I used to play as Fabregas on FIFA
